<RESUME_START>
VICE-PRESIDENT DATA AND MARKETING TECHNOLOGY
Professional Summary
I help media companies succeed with digital products and customer experiences.
My passion is helping people and organizations transform, grow, and thrive with a unique mix of strategy, marketing, product, and technology leadership.
This expertise has been developed over twenty years spent building successful digital businesses and products - across the world.

SKILLS

Team leadership Budgeting and finance Process implementation Project management
Staff development Strong verbal communication Extremely organized
Work History

04/2017 to Current
Vice-President Data and Marketing Technology
Company Name
— City , State
Driving evolution of the firm into a data-driven marketing company, leading the design and delivery of data-driven products, services, strategies, and platforms.
Setting the strategy and direction for a newly formed Data Division while hitting ambitious growth targets.
Leadership of in-house startup Orchestrate, which is a marketing funnel automation and lead nurturing platform for B2B markets that capitalizes on content marketing.
Leading full life cycle product development for data & data-driven products, including market research, positioning, processes, and technology.
Acting as product owner for data and martech across all platforms in our Agile processes.
Ensuring compliance with data privacy legislation functioning as Data Protection Officer.

03/2011 to 03/2017
Vice-President Digital Media
Company Name
— City , State
Responsible for shaping and executing product vision and strategy and driving digital business transformation.
Led product management, digital marketing, and digital strategy.
Responsible for 35 reports, budget of $5 million, 100+ web sites, 80+ mobile apps, matrix P&L owner for $25+ million digital business.
Led product development, market research, digital strategy, internal digital consulting, web production, online marketing, video production, and directory management.
Founded and co-led an in-house business startup at the junction of marketing technology, machine learning, and data.
Led extensive market research and co-wrote business plan.
Key contributor to the company's strategic plan known as Vision 2020.
Led digital sales to 10x increase over a five-year period, grew traffic 4x.
Drove CMS implementation projects to move 100 web sites to new CMS.

11/2007 to 03/2011
Director of Product Management
Company Name
— City , State
In this role, I built a world-class product management organization focused on customer-driven innovation.
Designed and implemented a new product development process which improved strategic alignment and sped the flow of new products through the pipeline, as well as leveraging innovation across all divisions.
Grew digital sales 60% and web traffic 50% the first full year in position, with strong >50% annual growth the following two years.
Led digital product sales growth of 10x in eight years.
Developed key metrics to drive the strategic and tactical goals and managed a product portfolio across multiple vertical markets.
Drove implementation of agile product development processes that improved quality & results.

01/2005 to 10/2007

— City , State
Drove major initiatives for database marketing, CRM, market sensing, data quality, and lead management resulting in significant sales growth and strategic advantage.

Responsible for driving positive change and measurable improvement of marketing and sales processes in North America, including implementation across 1,100 salespeople and multiple IT systems.
Owned customer data and related processes, led improvements in data gathering, creation, and sourcing processes resulting in achievement of Hilti's top rating globally in data quality.

— City , State
Global product owner for e — commerce , led global product development, marketing, and implementation for 15 major e-commerce web sites as well as e-procurement.
Achieved 2004 revenue target of 50 million CHF and drove annual growth exceeding 300% annually for three straight years.
Developed and implemented e-business project portfolio process that identified, prioritized, and measured business opportunities, resulting in 25% reduced average project delivery time and increased ROI.
Increased customer retention rate 40% and conversion rates over 30% by developing and executing online personalized marketing, grew traffic by 100% via SEO efforts.

E-Products Marketing Manager
Company Name
— City , State
Spearheaded market research, design, requirements, prototyping, and implementation of company's first & second generation e-commerce sites, established and managed ten-person e-commerce department.
Awarded Hilti North America's Leadership Award for exemplifying the company's leadership principles.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Digital Analyst (Google Analytics)

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Title: Digital Analytics Specialist
Location: Weehawken, NJ
Company: Advaana Inc.
About Advaana Inc.
Advaana Inc., a premier Digital Analytics consulting firm, stands as a martech ally for agencies and marketing teams. We excel in Google Analytics 4, mParticle, Firebase, Branch/Braze, among other technologies, driving optimization in digital marketing strategies through superior analytics implementations. Our proficiency extends to Google Tag Manager, Adobe Analytics, Adobe Experience Platform, Looker Studio, Tableau, Power BI, and cloud technologies including AWS, GCP, and Azure.
Position Overview:
Advaana Inc. is on the lookout for a skilled Digital Analytics Specialist for our NJ location. This pivotal role is designed for individuals eager to push the boundaries of digital marketing through insightful data analysis and technological integrations. The ideal candidate will be deeply versed in Google Analytics 4, supplemented by familiarity with mParticle, Firebase, and Branch/Braze.
Responsibilities:
- Mastery of Google Analytics 4 is essential, with valuable knowledge in mParticle, Firebase, Branch/Braze. Applicants should be proficient in tagging and ready to engage in design and architecture discussions.- Identify and integrate the optimal marketing automation software and technological solutions into clients' frameworks, ensuring alignment with their strategic objectives.- Utilize robust problem-solving capabilities to decipher metrics such as conversion rates, cost-per-lead, and click-through rates, extracting insights for progressive enhancements.- Play an instrumental role in refining marketing campaigns, elevating customer engagement, and bolstering overall business metrics through detailed data analysis and the strategic use of marketing technology tools.- Collaborate intimately with marketing teams, digital marketing professionals, data analysts, and developers to uncover opportunities, evaluate performance, and devise strategies for marketing optimization.- Engage in rigorous data analysis and reporting, adeptly employing marketing technology tools like Braze, mParticle, Branch, Snowflake, Google Analytics, and Google Tag Management for strategic decision-making.- Design, execute, and analyze A/B or multivariate tests, reporting on outcomes to guide marketing tactics.- Gather, track, and scrutinize data via KPIs such as click-through rate, conversion rate, and cost-per-lead, proposing methods to amplify customer acquisition, demand generation, and revenue.- Demonstrate intermediate expertise in new technology solutions, including project management software, digital advertising platforms, and database management and analytics.
Qualifications:
- Proficient in Google Analytics 4, with a keen understanding of mParticle, Firebase, Branch/Braze.- Hands-on experience with tagging, data analysis, and the application of marketing technology tools.- Strong analytical skills with the capacity to interpret complex data for business insights.- Collaborative spirit, able to work across teams and with client stakeholders.- Knowledge in conducting A/B testing, multivariate testing, and proficiency in reporting.- Intermediate level skills in project management software, digital advertising platforms, and database management and analytics.
Why Join Us?
Advaana Inc. offers a stimulating environment where innovation and growth are not just encouraged but are part of our DNA. Being at the forefront of digital analytics and marketing technology, we provide a collaborative culture where your contributions will have a direct impact on our success and that of our clients. If you are passionate about leveraging data to drive marketing success, your place is here with us.
Apply Now
Step into the future of digital marketing analytics with Advaana Inc. Submit your application today through LinkedIn or visit our website.
---
Advaana Inc. is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
